intro.title: Calculator Introduction
intro.description: Do you often wonder if what you're doing is worth your time? ðŸ¤” Should I spend time on this? This calculator helps solve this dilemma by helping you easily compute your hourly wage, enabling more effective time and money management. By entering your annual or monthly salary, the calculator will automatically calculate your effective hourly wage and help you assess whether activities or discounts are truly worthwhile. For example, when considering taking a taxi, you might also want to check out our {taxiCalculator} that uses a similar concept.

usage.title: How to Use This Calculator?
steps: Enter Annual Salary: Input your annual salary figure into the calculator.
Calculate Hourly Wage: The calculator will automatically compute your effective hourly wage based on your annual salary.
Evaluate Activities: Compare the calculated hourly wage with the costs of activities or discounts to decide if it's worth your time.

concept.title: Why Use "Hourly Wage Thinking"?
concept.description: The focus of "hourly wage thinking" is on the value of time, specifically how much value can be created per hour. With this mindset, you can clearly understand which activities are worth investing in and which are a waste of time.
benefits: Allocate Time Effectively: Identify activities that yield returns higher than your hourly wage.
Enhance Productivity: Focus on pursuits that can increase annual income or foster personal growth.
Avoid Time Waste: Recognize and eliminate unnecessary activities, making life more meaningful.
concept.conclusion: With this calculator, you can better apply the hourly wage thinking method, helping you move toward a more valuable existence.
